settings.question: Where are Biena Snacks products made?
settings.answer: All of our products are made in the USA.

settings.question: Which stores sell Biena?
settings.answer:
Biena Snacks are available nationwide in over 15,000 locations at retailers including Whole Foods, Amazon, Walmart, Kroger, and on our website at BienaSnacks.com.

Click here to search our store locator. Have a favorite store that doesnâ€™t sell Biena? Reach out and let us know: hello@bienasnacks.com

settings.question: Where can I find the nutritional information for your products?
settings.answer: You can find the nutritional information on each  productâ€™s page on our website. Click through the product images to find the back of our packaging, which shows the Nutritional Facts Panel and the list of ingredients.
